title: Auto transport damage inspection reports
dataVerified: Carrier, vehicle VIN, pre-transport condition, damage notation, photos
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Inspection status (completed/verified). Link to auto transport carrier system (vehicle owner and carrier, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents altered damage reports (transport damage fraud). Domain binding verifies auto transport carrier. Pre-existing damage documentation. Prevents fraudulent damage claims. Multi-page: Inspection reports with photos are multi-page.
